original: @22b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @22b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ti thi ka tsand'a l'i ka n'a ma /
analyzed: ti thi ka tsand'a l'i ka n'a ma /
translated: Tīrthika-cāṇḍālī-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba /
translated: The Cāṇḍālī of the Non-Buddhists

original: byang chub sems dpa' thal skud can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thal skud can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bodhisattva with the Turban

original: bud med gnas ni dbu rgyan m'a //🔽rigs ni gtum mo'i @23a * //
analyzed: bud med gnas ni dbu rgyan m'a // rigs ni gtum mo'i @23a * //
translated: The abode of women is the crown

original: rigs gyur pa //
analyzed: rigs gyur pa //
translated: The family is the family of Cāṇḍālī

original: srid pa gsum yang sreg par byed //
analyzed: srid pa gsum yang sreg par byed //
translated: It burns even the three existences

original: me lce nam mkhar khyab par byed //
analyzed: me lce nam mkhar khyab par byed //
translated: The flame of fire pervades the sky

original: aa rtsi na dpal ni gar byed 'gyur //
analyzed: aa rtsi na dpal ni gar byed 'gyur //
translated: The glorious Acinā dances

original: nam mkha' rde'u chung sa la rde'u chung brdung //
analyzed: nam mkha' rde'u chung sa la rde'u chung brdung //
translated: A small stone in the sky strikes a small stone on the ground

original: rdo rje mi yis rgyu mtsho skems //
analyzed: rdo rje mi yis rgyu mtsho skems //
translated: A vajra man dries up the ocean🔽Even the two sun and moon are brought under protection

original: nyi zla gnyis kyang skyabs su gzhug / gar byed dpal gyi aa tsi na thod pa can //
analyzed: nyi zla gnyis kyang skyabs su gzhug / gar byed dpal gyi aa tsi na thod pa can //
translated: The glorious Acinā with a skull dances

original: nam mkhar rde'i chung sa la rde'u chung brdung //
analyzed: nam mkhar rde'i chung sa la rde'u chung brdung //
translated: A small stone in the sky strikes a small stone on the ground🔽The gods, demigods, and humans

original: lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // dbang phyug au ma la sogs pa //
analyzed: lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // dbang phyug au ma la sogs pa //
translated: Maheśvara, Umā, and so forth

original: thams cad ye shes me yis bsregs //
analyzed: thams cad ye shes me yis bsregs //
translated: Are all burned by the fire of wisdom

original: gar byed dpal gyi aa tsa na thod pa can //
analyzed: gar byed dpal gyi aa tsa na thod pa can //
translated: The glorious Acinā with a skull dances

original: nam mkhar rde'u chung sa la rde'u chung brdung //
analyzed: nam mkhar rde'u chung sa la rde'u chung brdung //
translated: A small stone in the sky, a small stone on the ground.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni khrid byas nas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni khrid byas nas //
translated: Having guided the yoginīs,

original: mgon po'i gnas su 'jug par byed //
analyzed: mgon po'i gnas su 'jug par byed //
translated: one should enter the abode of the lord.

original: 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor glu ru blangs //
analyzed: 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor glu ru blangs //
translated: Such is the song of the maṇḍala.

original: gar byed dpal ni aa tsin thod pa can //
analyzed: gar byed dpal ni aa tsin thod pa can //
translated: Dancing, glorious Acintapāṇi,

original: nam mkhar rde'u chung sa rde'u chung brdung //
analyzed: nam mkhar rde'u chung sa rde'u chung brdung //
translated: a small stone in the sky, a small stone on the ground.

original: mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba slob dpon aa tsintas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: mu stegs kyi gtum mo zhes bya ba slob dpon aa tsintas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The so-called “Caṇḍālī of the tīrthikas” composed by Ācārya Acintapāṇi is complete.
